com.mapgroup.classificator.mail

Class MailAddressValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapgroup.classificator.mail.MailAddressValidator

  • public class MailAddressValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class grants to validate the email address according to the internet mail address format.

    The email validation functionality was provided by the class InternetAddress of the javax.mail library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private MailAddressValidator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void validate(java.lang.String mailAddress)
      Checks if the specified mail address mailAddress is in the specific internet address format.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static void validate(java.lang.String mailAddress)
                     throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException
        Checks if the specified mail address mailAddress is in the specific internet address format.

        An InternetAddress object was created from the specified email address and the email address validation was provided by these class's functionality.

        Parameters:
        mailAddress - the email address
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - - if the specified mail address is not in the correct format
